CustomField.formula:
/*IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.SyncedQuote.Service_Period__c, '6 months'),
(DATE( YEAR( Opportunity.CloseDate ) + FLOOR( ( MONTH ( Opportunity.CloseDate ) + 6 - 1 ) / 12 ), MOD( MONTH ( Opportunity.CloseDate ) + 6 - 1 + IF( DAY ( Opportunity.CloseDate) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( Opportunity.CloseDate ) + 6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, 0 ), 12 ) + 1, IF( DAY( Opportunity.CloseDate) > CASE( MOD( MONTH( Opportunity.CloseDate ) +6 - 1, 12 ) + 1, 2, 28, 4, 30, 6, 30, 9, 30, 11, 30, 31 ), 1, DAY( Opportunity.CloseDate ) ) )-1),
IF( MOD( YEAR( Opportunity.CloseDate ) + 1, 400 ) = 0 || AND(MOD( YEAR( Opportunity.CloseDate ) + 1, 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( Opportunity.CloseDate ) + 1, 100 ) != 0)
, IF(MONTH(Opportunity.CloseDate) <= 2, Opportunity.CloseDate + 364, Opportunity.CloseDate + 365) , Opportunity.CloseDate + 364) )*/
Opportunity.Contract_End_Date__c
CustomField.label: JustOn: ServicePeriodEnd
